Package frc.robot.util

Class TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
frc.robot.util.TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.wpi.first.util.sendable.Sendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArmSubsystem
public abstract class TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876 extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.SubsystemBase
A subsystem that generates and runs trapezoidal motion profiles automatically. The user specifies how to use the current state of the motion profile by overriding the `useState` method.

This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep

    • TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876

      public TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876(edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.TrapezoidProfile.Constraints constraints, double initialPosition, double period)
      Creates a new TrapezoidProfileSubsystem2876.
      Parameters:
      constraints - The constraints (maximum velocity and acceleration) for the profiles.
      initialPosition - The initial position of the controlled mechanism when the subsystem is constructed.
      period - The period of the main robot loop, in seconds.

      public final void setGoal(double goal)

      Parameters:
      goal - The goal position for the subsystem's motion profile.
